contest-event.event-date: Feb. 4, 1973 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Rienzi [unknown arranger] Welfare Hall, Easington Prizes - 1st £18 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 8 bands competed.
